new_src_summary:
摘要：这段中文文段描述了一个紧张而充满戏剧性的场景，主要讲述了东宫老爷子与来访者裴逸之间的互动。裴逸的到来似乎与某种目的相关，但东宫老爷子对此感到困惑，不知裴逸为何而来。裴逸与东宫老爷子的对话充满了暗示和挑衅，暗示着他们之间可能存在着某种不为人知的恩怨。

文段整体属于小说或故事的风格，以对话为主，通过人物之间的交流揭示情节发展和角色性格。语气中带有紧张感和冲突的气息，同时也包含了一些幽默和讽刺元素，使得整个场景既紧张又不乏趣味性。

关键信息包括：东宫老爷子与裴逸之间的不明关系，裴逸的突然造访引起东宫老爷子的疑惑，以及裴逸与东宫家族成员之间的互动，暗示了背后可能存在的复杂背景和矛盾。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 1303 titled "As Long As You", Donggong Old Master angrily taps his walking stick, expressing his annoyance as the ancestors are about to arrive. He requests that whoever is causing trouble calms down, suggesting their actions will become clear soon. The person in front acknowledges that Donggong Old Master knows who the "ancestors" refer to. Meanwhile, Pei Yi's car arrives, and An Xiaolei, without removing her mask or wig, gets out of her car, followed by Wu Lianzhi. Upon seeing An Xiaolei, Pei Yi smiles, complimenting her disguise. He questions Wu Lianzhi's presence, to which she responds there's something important. Pei Yi then turns to the East Palace family members with a faint smile, asking if one of his sister's actions offended theirs, leading to their desire to harm her. He challenges them with his boldness.

rel_src: 裴逸下意识的瞥了一眼吴莲止，“你怎么跟他在一块？”
裴逸还没回答，安小柠见机行事喊了一声他，“哥哥，他是我男朋友，我现在肚子里有了他的骨肉，你不能扔下他啊。”
rel_tgt: Pei Yi subconsciously glanced at Wu Lianzhi, "Why are you with him?"
Before Pei Yi could answer, An Xiaolei took advantage of the situation and called out to him, "Brother, he's my boyfriend. I'm carrying his child now. You can't just leave him behind."

src: “今天早上，当我母亲给我送有毒饭菜的时候，我就已经当场和她决断了母女关系，此前，当东宫家族的人企图将我和安小姐以及他的属下设计成意外死亡的时候，我就已经很明确了，现在虽然东宫莲止这个名字还在族谱和东宫家族的户口簿上，但是，我现在已经不姓东宫了，我现在姓吴，吴莲止是我现在的名字，我已不是东宫家族的人！”
ref: “When my mother delivered some poisoned dishes to me this morning, I had already severed all ties with her. Prior to this, the Donggong family tried to kill me, Ms. An, and her subordinates under the facade of it being an accident. I already knew then that I’m no longer a member of the Donggong family, although it says so in the official records. My last name is now ‘Wu.’ My name is Wu Lianzhi. I no longer belong to the Donggong family!”
hyp: "Early this morning, when my mother delivered poisoned food to me, I immediately severed our mother-daughter relationship. Prior to that, when the East Palace family tried to frame An Miss and me along with his subordinate as accidental deaths, I was already very clear on the situation. Although 'East Palace Lianzhi' still appears in the family register and the East Palace family's household registry, I am no longer of the East Palace family. Now, I am姓吴, Gou Lianzhi is my current name, and I am no longer a part of the East Palace family!"
rel_src: “当然了，就是不想让他们知道我的身份，所以才让你来的，现在还不是时候。”
“你觉得我会同意吗？”
rel_tgt: "Of course, I just don't want them to know my identity, which is why I sent you. It's not the right time yet."
"Do you think I would agree?"

src: 这话是出自吴莲止之口，口气生疏，毫无畏惧。
ref: Wu Lianzhi said dauntlessly in an austere tone.

new_src_summary:
这段中文文段描绘了一个充满紧张气氛和戏剧性的场景，主要围绕东宫家族与裴逸家族之间的冲突展开。裴逸的突然造访引发了东宫老爷子的疑惑，两人之间的对话充满了暗示和挑衅，暗示着他们之间可能存在不为人知的恩怨。随后，冲突进一步升级，主要焦点集中在裴逸妹妹与东宫莲止的关系上，以及她声称已怀有东宫莲止孩子的事实。安小柠的介入，自称为东宫莲止的女友，进一步加剧了这场纠纷。裴逸明确表示将处理此事，并强调拥有决定权。东宫莲止则公开宣布与东宫家族决裂，指责家族试图谋害安小柠，这引发了复杂的情感纠葛和权力斗争。老太太坚持家族规矩，强调一旦成为家族成员，生死皆属于家族。然而，东宫莲止提出，如果家族继续策划谋杀安小柠，他们需考虑S国的正式抗议。

整个文段采用小说或故事的风格，以对话为主，通过人物之间的交流揭示情节发展和角色性格。语气中充满紧张感和冲突气息，同时也蕴含了幽默和讽刺元素，使得场景既紧张又不乏趣味性。这段文段属于家庭与权力斗争的文学或小说类文本，涉及家族伦理、个人身份认同及国家外交因素，展现了家族内部权力的争夺、个人与家族身份的认同问题，以及面对外部压力时的应对策略。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 1303, titled "As Long As You," Donggong Old Master expresses his irritation as the ancestors approach, urging the troublemaker to cease their actions since their identity will soon be revealed. The person in front acknowledges Donggong Old Master's understanding of who the "ancestors" are. Meanwhile, An Xiaolei, without removing her mask or wig, exits her car, accompanied by Wu Lianzhi. Upon seeing An Xiaolei, Pei Yi compliments her disguise and questions Wu Lianzhi's presence, to which she responds with urgency. Pei Yi addresses the East Palace family members, suggesting that one of his sister's actions may have led to their desire to harm her. He challenges them, hinting at his boldness. The situation escalates when An Xiaolei, revealed as Pei Yi's girlfriend and expecting his child, intervenes. Despite the East Palace family's reluctance to give up Prince Lianzhi, Pei Yi insists on taking An Xiaolei and the child. In response, Wu Lianzhi declares his separation from the East Palace family, confirming he is not the father of the child and mentioning his mother's attempt to frame An Xiaolei and himself as accidental deaths. Donggong Old Master asserts that those who enter the East Palace family remain part of it even after death, sparking a discussion about potential consequences for the family's actions.

src: “我和安小柠是打过交道的。”裴逸微微一笑，“她这个人，是有仇必报的类型，你们想要她的命，她能善罢甘休吗？”

"Pei Yi and I have had dealings before," Pei Yi smiled slightly, "She's the type who seeks revenge against her enemies. If you wish to harm her, do you think she would simply accept defeat?"

rel_src: “今天早上，当我母亲给我送有毒饭菜的时候，我就已经当场和她决断了母女关系，此前，当东宫家族的人企图将我和安小姐以及他的属下设计成意外死亡的时候，我就已经很明确了，现在虽然东宫莲止这个名字还在族谱和东宫家族的户口簿上，但是，我现在已经不姓东宫了，我现在姓吴，吴莲止是我现在的名字，我已不是东宫家族的人！”
“不是说会答应我一个要求的么，我都还没说这个，就说回国？”
rel_tgt: "Early this morning, when my mother delivered poisoned food to me, I immediately severed our mother-daughter relationship. Prior to that, when the East Palace family tried to frame An Miss and me along with his subordinate as accidental deaths, I was already very clear on the situation. Although 'East Palace Lianzhi' still appears in the family register and the East Palace family's household registry, I am no longer of the East Palace family. Now, I am姓吴, Gou Lianzhi is my current name, and I am no longer a part of the East Palace family!"
"Didn't you say you would agree to my request? I haven't even mentioned this, and now you're talking about going back home?"

src: 车内的吴莲止听着俩人的对话，着实是觉得，这俩人是不是有一腿？
ref: After hearing their conversation, Wu Lianzhi could not help but wonder, Are they in a relationship?
hyp: Inside the car, An Xiaolei listened to their conversation, genuinely wondering if these two people were involved romantically.
new_src_summary:
这段中文文段描绘了东宫家族与裴逸家族之间的紧张冲突，以及与安小柠的复杂互动，形成了一个充满戏剧性和冲突的小说或故事场景。裴逸的突然到访引发了东宫老爷子的疑惑，两人的对话充满了暗示和挑衅，预示着他们之间可能存在的恩怨。冲突的焦点转向了裴逸妹妹与东宫莲止的关系，特别是她声称怀有东宫莲止孩子的事实。安小柠的介入，自称为东宫莲止的女友，进一步加剧了纠纷。东宫莲止公开宣布与东宫家族决裂，指责家族试图谋害安小柠，引发了一系列复杂的情感纠葛和权力斗争。老太太坚持家族规矩，强调一旦成为家族成员，生死皆属于家族。然而，东宫莲止提出，若家族继续策划谋杀安小柠，则需考虑向S国提出正式抗议。

在这一过程中，东宫莲止表现出毫不畏惧的态度，提及安小柠为“有仇必报”的类型，暗示安小柠可能对东宫家族构成威胁。裴逸在了解情况后，决定将涉及此事的两人带走，以防止冲突升级至暴力事件。东宫家族对此表示愤怒，并将裴逸的名字从族谱中除名并销毁户口。裴逸提出希望回到S国，并表示愿意满足安小柠的一个要求。安小柠提出了两个条件：不能限制她的自由，且时间期限为两天。裴逸同意了五天的时间限制，前提是他不能违背之前的承诺，即给予安小柠自由。最终，安小柠请求先行回国，但被裴逸拒绝。

这段文本通过对话形式，展现了紧张、愤怒、妥协等复杂情绪，揭示了家族内部权力的争夺、个人与家族身份的认同问题，以及面对外部压力时的应对策略。它涉及家庭纠纷、权力争夺、个人恩怨及人际关系处理等元素，展现了角色的性格特点、行为动机以及最终的解决方案。整体上，这段文本采用了紧凑有力的语言，通过角色的言语和行动展现了复杂的人物关系和情感冲突，营造出一幅充满张力的情景画面。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 1303, "As Long As You," Donggong Old Master expresses annoyance at the approaching ancestors, urging a troublemaker to stop their actions as their identity will soon be revealed. An Xiaolei, disguised without removing her mask or wig, exits her car with Wu Lianzhi. Pei Yi compliments her disguise and questions Wu Lianzhi's presence, who responds urgently. Pei Yi suggests that one of his sister's actions may have led to the East Palace family's desire to harm An Xiaolei. The situation escalates when An Xiaolei, revealed as Pei Yi's girlfriend and expecting his child, intervenes. Despite the East Palace family's reluctance, Pei Yi insists on taking An Xiaolei and the child. Wu Lianzhi declares his separation from the East Palace family, confirming he is not the father and mentions his mother's attempt to frame them as accidental deaths. Donggong Old Master asserts that those who enter the East Palace family remain part of it even after death, sparking a discussion about potential consequences. Wu Lianzhi speaks with a distant tone, indicating a lack of fear, and Pei Yi asserts his intention to take both Wu Lianzhi and herself, implying a desire for swift action. The East Palace family's attempts to intervene lead to disappointment as their course of action seems thwarted. Donggong Old Master and the patriarch decide to remove Pei Yi's name from their list and cancel his household registration. Pei Yi mentions their intention to return to S Nation, leading to a discussion about fulfilling a request made by someone, with an exchange of promises and conditions regarding the nature of this request, including time constraints and personal freedoms.
